title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 440.10 - Compliance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 440.10 - Compliance

State Regulations
(a) In order to
enforce the provisions of Workers' Compensation Law section 13(i) and13-o and
this Part, the chair may exercise his authority under Workers' Compensation Law
section 111 to request information, which includes documents, reports, interrogatories and examinations under oath. (b) The chair may refer any violations of

Workers' Compensation Law section 13(i) and13-o or this Part by: (1)
a carrier to the Superintendent of

Insurance; (2)
a pharmacy or
medical provider other than a physician to the New York State Education

Department Office of the Professions; and
(3)
a physician to the New York State

Department of Health Office for Professional Medical Conduct. In addition to
the referral to the referenced above, the chair or his or her designee may also
commence a proceeding to revoke or temporarily suspend the authorization of a
medical provider. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
440.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
